name: Introduction to Photography
description: Learn the fundamentals of photography, including camera settings, composition, and lighting techniques.

name: Portrait Photography
description: Master the art of capturing stunning portraits, working with natural light and posing techniques.

name: Landscape Photography
description: Explore the beauty of nature through landscape photography, including composition and post-processing.

name: Street Photography
description: Capture the essence of urban life and candid moments with street photography techniques.

name: Fashion Photography
description: Learn the art of capturing stunning fashion shots, working with models, and creating a unique style.

name: Wildlife Photography
description: Master the skills to photograph wildlife in their natural habitats, capturing captivating moments.

name: Black and White Photography
description: Discover the art of black and white photography, emphasizing contrast, texture, and mood.

name: Food Photography
description: Learn how to capture mouth-watering food images, using lighting, composition, and styling techniques.

name: Astrophotography
description: Explore the beauty of the night sky and capture stunning images of stars, galaxies, and celestial objects.

name: Wedding Photography
description: Learn how to capture beautiful moments on a couple's special day, including posing and composition.
